content: 43 *p2 k2 p2 k1 ssk p3 k2tog k1 p2 k2 repeat from * three more times 68 sts round 44 * p2 k2 twice p3 k2 p2 k2 repeat from * three more times round 45 *p2 k2 p2 k1 ssk p1 k2tog k1 p2 k2 repeat from * three more times 60 sts round 46 * p2 k2 twice p1 k2 p2 k2 repeat from * three more times round 47 *p2 k2 p2 k1 sl1 knit-wise k2tog psso k1 p2 k2 repeat from * three more times 52 sts round 48 *p2 k2 p2 k3 p2 k2 repeat from * three more times round 49 *p2 k2 p2 sl1 k2tog psso p2 k2 repeat from * three more times 44 sts round 50 *p2 k2 p2 k1 p2 k2 repeat from * three more times round 51 *p2 k1 ssk p3 k2tog k1 repeat from * three more times 36 sts round 52 *p2 k2 p3 k2 repeat from * three more times round 53 *p2 k1 ssk p1 k2tog k1 repeat from * three more times 28 sts round 54 *p2 k2 p1 k2 repeat from * three more times round 55 *p2 k1 sl1 k2tog psso k1 repeat from * three more times 20 sts round 56 *p2 k3 repeat from * three more times round 57 *p2 sl1 k2tog psso repeat from * three more times 12 sts round 58 & 59 purl all sts break yarn leaving an 8 inch / 20 cm tail thread the tail through a yarn needle and pass needle through all live stitches twice and pull tight weave in ends soak in warm water until fibers are completely saturated remove excess water using a towel or salad spinner and block to desired size using whatever household object meets your needs i used a small grapefruit placed on top of a mason jar this pattern is offered for personal non-commercial use only and © infinite twist 2019 visit infinitetwist comfor patterns tutorials and knitting kits page 2
